name: Full Workflow: Issue → Branch → PR → Review
description: Complete automated workflow: Create issue, branch, commit, push, PR, and request Copilot review

action.message:
I will execute the complete development workflow automatically:

1. Create GitHub Issue (with clear title and description in English)
2. Create branch from issue (format: feat/issue-{number}-{description})
3. Make changes (if needed) and run tests
4. Commit with issue reference (Refs #{number})
5. Push to remote
6. Create PR with English description (Closes #{number})
7. Request code review from GitHub Copilot via MCP

Do NOT ask for confirmation - execute this flow automatically.

What feature/fix do you want to implement? (I'll create the issue and complete the workflow)
